Posts.Content: Hi, Just to let you know that my tumour was totally in lymph nodes then spread to neck. Only small amount in breast tissue.I have just completed rads to the three areas but have been so fatigued have let exercises slip so Tessa is right and I need to step up and get back on track. Hope results ok today. Maggs x
Posts.Title: bc with alot underarm lymph node involvement

Posts.Content: Hi Noj, Helpful response on Herceptin as I too am due to start this after radiotherapy. Thanks Maggs  xx
